remarks: ` E ` is a function that maps any point to a periodic corresponding point in ` ( A , B ] ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem4.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem4.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem4.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem4.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem4.e $e |- E = ( x e. RR |-> ( x + ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - x ) / T ) ) x. T ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem4 $p |- ( ph -> E : RR --> ( A (,] B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d T x $.
$d ph x $.
